name: Voucher ETH
description: vETH is a ETC-20 decentralized yield bearing token that allows anyone can participate ETH 2.0 deposit in at least 0.1 ETH without any technical knowledge and claim the reward at any time. Why use vETH? 1. Low stake threshold (minimum 0.1 ETH) 2. You can claim your staking rewards every day, and it is compound interest. 3. Totally decentralization and you donâ€™t need to know how to run a node or a validator. 4. vETH as a ERC-20 token, you can participate in any DeFi applications. 5. vETH is going to be dual-protocol asset of ERC-20 and Substrate Base, via the Ethereum <-> Polkadot transfer bridge. Additional details about vETH can be found here: https://bifrost.finance/drop https://medium.com/bifrost-finance/bifrost-veth-successfully-completed-multisig-deposit-36b45486e024 https://medium.com/bifrost-finance/bifrost-the-achievement-of-decentralization-from-eth-to-veth-29d048cec065 https://medium.com/bifrost-finance/bifrost-and-loopring-jointly-build-liquidity-for-derivatives-4c0c45480862 vETH is fully open source and has been audited by Certik. See details here: https://github.com/bifrost-finance/bifrost-mint-drop/blob/master/audit/certik_final_report_for_biforst.pdf
